resources.string: To Fall in Love With Anyone

According to Dr. Aron's study, it's possible to fall in love with anyone! 

A heterosexual man and woman enter the lab through separate doors. They sit face to face and answer a series of increasingly personal questions. Then they stare silently into each other’s eyes for four minutes. 

The most tantalizing detail: Six months later, two participants were married! 

Are you in?
"Click OK if you want to load the study in PDF from Internet"
Congratulations! That was the last Question! Now prepare to look each other in the eyes for 4 minutes…
You should be in love by now! ;-)
